question:
Which among the following about the Pitt's India Act are correct?
1. It established the Board of Control consisting of six members
2. The member of the governor-general council was reduced to three
3. The court of directors were given the right to make appointments of the servants
4. It declared no pardon were to be granted to the official offenders
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Pitt\'s India Act was passed in 1784. As per the act the Board of Control was established consisting of six members. The member of the governor-general council was reduced to three from four. The court of directors were given the right to make appointments of the servants. It declared no pardon were to be granted to the official offenders.
